description: Newcastle transfer rumours: Moise Kean, Aaron Ramsdale
title: Newcastle transfer rumours: Moise Kean, Aaron Ramsdale
title_page: Newcastle transfer rumours: Moise Kean, Aaron Ramsdale  - BBC Sport
maintext:
Newcastle have made direct contact with the agent of Fiorentina striker Moise Kean about a summer move, with the 25-year-old Italy striker also interesting Arsenal, Tottenham, AC Milan, Napoli and Barcelona. (Calciomercato - in Italian), external
Eddie Howe is also a big fan of Southampton goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale and is considering meeting a Â£25m clause to sign the 26-year-old England international. (Football Insider), external
